name: spo-configure-documentid-feature
title: Enabling and Configuring Document ID in SharePoint
shortDescription: The script enables and configures Document ID within a SharePoint site
longDescription: The script enables and configures Document ID within a SharePoint site: activates the Document ID feature, updates the Document ID prefix and add the Document ID column to the default view.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
